Summarize YouTube videos, Blog posts, Any URL, Articles, Research papers, PDFs, Google Drive files, Google Docs, or any content with just a few clicks. Save time and Boost Productivity today.

✅ Quickly summarize any YouTube video 
✅ Efficiently summarize content from any online link

Unique Features of TubeOnAI:

📹 YouTube Summarizer: Digest long YouTube videos in minutes with our easy-to-understand AI summaries.
🌐 Web Summarizer: Summarize any publicly accessible online content such as blog posts, research articles, PDFs, Google Drive files, and more.
🌍 Translate Summary: Translate summaries in 20+ languages and understand complex topics in your native language.
⏱️ Timestamps: Easily navigate through your preferred sections of a YouTube video by clicking on the time segments.
📄 Instant Transcript: Get a full YouTube video transcript with the click of a button!

Why Choose TubeOnAI?

🤖 Summarize Anything With AI: No need to use multiple tools to summarize different formats of content. TubeOnAI lets you summarize any file with AI. Summarize videos, PDFs, slides, articles, or any web links that are available online.
✔️ Accurate AI Summaries: Our fine-tuned AI ensures you receive accurate information from your favorite content without any compromise.
⏳ Key Insights in Seconds: Learn all the essential insights from lengthy YouTube videos, articles, or web links without spending hours.
🧠 Smarter Learning: A topic too hard to understand? Summarize it in your own language and get a better understanding of a subject.

Who Should Use Our Extension:

🎓 Students
🔍 Researchers
🎥 Content Creators
📈 Marketers
💼 Entrepreneurs
🏢 Busy professionals
⏱️ Anyone who wants to save time and learn.

How to Use the TubeOnAI Extension:

Install the Extension: Add TubeOnAI to your Chrome browser from the Chrome Web Store.
Login: Use your Google Account or Email Address to log in.
Summarize: Choose your video or web article and click "Summarize Now" to get an instant summary.

🌟 Why Wait? Get Started Now!

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)

❓ What is Web Summary?
Web Summary is our innovative feature that lets you summarize any publicly accessible online content such as blog posts, research papers, PDFs, PowerPoint slides, Google Drive files, and much more.
❓ Do I need a ChatGPT account to use this extension?
No, you do not need a ChatGPT account to enjoy the features of this extension. Simply click the TubeOnAI extension button and generate summaries as you prefer without the hassle of creating a free or premium account.
❓ Can I Summarize My Google Drive Files with TubeOnAI?
Yes, you can summarize your Google Drive files such as PDFs, slides, and videos with TubeOnAI. Make sure you have set the file-sharing settings to publicly viewable so that TubeOnAI can summarize the content for you.
